briefdescription.para: Contains built-in filters (Lagrangian and diagram filters) for the mty::FeynOptions object.

simplesect.para: To enable the calculation without filtering but select specific contributions at the end, see mty::Amplitude::filterOut() instead.
mty::InteractionTerm, mty::FeynmanDiagram, mty::FeynOptions, mty::FeynOptions::DiagramFilter, mty::FeynOptions::LagrangianFilter, mty::FeynOptions::addFilter(), mty::FeynOptions::addFilters().
